> "Excuse me."  Empath gives Windlord a quick kiss on the cheek and 
> transforms to her own leopard form.
> 
> She quickly catches up with Maxima.  After making sure they're out 
of 
> earshot, she looks at her old friend.  "Okay, what's up?"

Her optics glanced about. "They may still here us," looking up at the 
base. "No matter." then she looked at her comrade. "I was restored in 
this form for some reason, which is unknown to me. However, I don't 
plan to stay in this pathetic form for long. I crached not far from 
here. The ship contains large amounts of supplies... metallic 
supplies. I intend to use them to reconstruct my old form. However, I 
lack the skill to do it. Now, as I have come to find out, that we are 
in Earth past." She smirked. "I intend to find the Ark. Teletran-1 
can reconstruct my form." 

"You are more than welcome to join me & rebuild your form back to the 
noble Seeker you were during the Great War." 

She paused. "Are you with me? If not, no matter, I will do this 
alone. Would attract less attention. I do not intend to jeopardize 
our comrades in stasis in the Ark. I have a feeling though, that we 
will be needed to protect it eventually."
